name: 2025 10th International Conference on Marketing, Business and Trade
content: Publication: Journal Publications: IJTEF or JOEBM Submitted papers will undergo a double-blind review process by program chairs and technical committee, and accepted papers after proper registration and presentation will be published in IJTEF or JOEBM IJTEF: International Journal of Trade, Economics and Finance (IJTEF) ISSN: 2010-023X (Print) DOI: 10.18178/IJTEF Abstracting/ Indexing: Crossref, Electronic Journals Library, EBSCO Frequency: Quarterly JOEBM: Journal of Economics, Business and Management (JOEBM) ISSN: 2301-3567 (Print), 2972-3981 (Online) DOI: 10.18178/JOEBM Abstracting/ Indexing: CNKI, Google Scholar, Electronic Journals Library, Crossref, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, MESLibrary, etc Frequency: Quarterly For those who're NOT looking to publish their papers, it's acceptable to submit your abstracts to the conference, which will be sent to at least two technical committees for a brief review, and it will take about 7-10 working days.
